mapper.update: update auth_user set `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_superuser = #{isSuperuser,jdbcType=BIT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_staff = #{isStaff,jdbcType=BIT}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, date_joined = #{dateJoined,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `password`, last_login, is_superuser, username, first_name, last_name, email, is_staff, is_active, date_joined from auth_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, `password`, last_login, is_superuser, username, first_name, last_name, email, is_staff, is_active, date_joined from auth_user
